snippet: Michael Dewey makes an avian-able debut.
abstract: Michael Dewey makes an avian-able debut.
lead_paragraph: MONDAY'S PUZZLE - Interesting. You would think a simple, clean theme like this had been done before, but in this debut by Michael Dewey, it seems as if the theme entries are appearing for the first time in The New York Times. It's possible that similar, avian-themed grids have appeared in other newspapers, but not here.
